summary: The Increased TSP Access Act of 2025 amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to modify the delivery of technical assistance for conservation practices. The bill focuses on expanding access to third-party providers for technical help. It establishes certification processes for these providers, including non-Federal entities and State agencies. The legislation mandates the Secretary of Agriculture to streamline certification, set payment amounts for technical services, and improve data transparency. It also includes provision for review of the program and setting target utilization rates.
